com.att.aro.commonui

Class AROUIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.UIManager
      • com.att.aro.commonui.AROUIManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AROUIManager
extends javax.swing.UIManager
    An extension of the UIManager class that contains Fields which define the look and feel of the ARO Data Analyzer application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.UIManager

      The Key that is used to map the label font style in the underlying UIManager class.

      The Key that is used to map the background Color in the underlying UIManager class.
